title: Fix 7 content accuracy issues from QA audit (TASK-031)
description:
Fix all 7 issues found by QA in TASK-031:
BUG-1 (HIGH): README shows 'mx-lite config get provider' — change to 'config show' (the actual subcommand).
BUG-2 (MEDIUM): README says default playlist length is 25 — change to 30.
BUG-3 (MEDIUM): README says config in ~/.config/mixaroo-lite/ — change to ~/.config/mixaroo-lite-nodejs/.
BUG-4 (MEDIUM): PUBLISHING.md claims ~30 files ~17kB — update numbers after TASK-033 tarball fix. Run npm pack and count.
BUG-5 (LOW): Blog post says ~500 lines of TypeScript — update to ~1668 lines.
BUG-6 (LOW): Blog post lists save/load as future roadmap but it's already implemented — update roadmap section.
BUG-7 (INFO): CHANGELOG date 2026-02-20 — keep as-is unless told otherwise.
Files to edit: README.md, docs/blog-how-i-built.md, PUBLISHING.md (if exists).

comments.text: Fixed 6 of 7 issues (BUG-7 kept as-is per task). Config path corrected across README, blog, demo-output. Default length updated. Blog line count and roadmap fixed. PUBLISHING.md stale numbers removed.
